member.name: M:Products_Catalog.Controllers.api.ExportProductsListController.ExportProductsList(System.String)
member.summary: Export list of products to Excel. If parameter ID is empty - Full list. If parameter ID contains word - filtered by name list. Returns Excel file URL.

member.name: M:Products_Catalog.Controllers.api.FilteredListController.GetProductsList(System.String)
member.summary: Returns filtered by part of name list of products.

member.name: M:Products_Catalog.Controllers.api.ValuesController.GetProduct(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns one product by its ID.

member.name: M:Products_Catalog.Controllers.api.ValuesController.CreateProduct(Products_Catalog.Models.Product)
member.summary: Creats product (with photo or without photo). Needs PRODUCT as parameter.

member.name: M:Products_Catalog.Controllers.api.ValuesController.DeleteProduct(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes product by its ID. Void. Nothing returns.

member.name: M:Products_Catalog.Controllers.api.ValuesController.EditProduct(System.Int32,Products_Catalog.Models.Product)
member.summary: Updates product information. Needs product ID and PRODUCT as parameters. Void. Nothing returns.
